used: Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Stripe API, Heroku
description: A site where people can discover and register for nearby courses to learn a new skill, pick up a new hobby, or just meet new people.
A fun twist on the typical calculator app. You may not get the right answer, but you will surely get entertainment.
CSS/SCSS Travel site for reviews and the best deals.

used: Javascript, Webpack, Babel, Axios, Food2Fork API
description: Recipe API App. Search for any type of food and find different recipes. Adjust the serving size to calculate the right amount of ingredients. Add ingredients to your shopping list and save your favorite recipes.
Movie database. Search for movies, TV shows, actors, celebrities, and more.
CSS/SCSS landing page for adventure booking company. Packed with animations, pricing flip cards, custom form and more.
Basic budgeting app. Calculate your income and expenses, find out your budget for the month.
A two player game where each player takes turn rolling dice. The first player to score 100 points wins. If either player rolls 1 they will lose the points from that round.

used: Javascript, Google Firebase, Google Nearby Places API
description: An app where users can enter their desired address and what type of nearby places are important to them. They will then get a score report based on the their preferences and location entered.
